description: Surface wind speed and direction extracted from Comprehensive Ocean-Atmosphere Data Set (COADS) two-degree mean monthly climatology. Monthly summaries are averaged over 2 degree grids and data over land removed. COADS data provided by the NOAA/OAR/ESRL PSD, Boulder, Colorado, USA. The ASCLME (Agulhas and Somali Currents Large Marine Ecosystem) includes the countries Kenya, Mauritius, Madagascar, Mozambique, Seychelles, South Africa, Tanzania.
name: ASCLME: Wind Speed and Direction (April)
